data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Santa Cruz, Bolivia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Cruz, Bolivia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Santa Cruz.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Santa Cruz that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Santa Cruz, Bolivia honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Santa Cruz, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, move the 513,987 believers in the state of Santa Cruz to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Santa Cruz.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Santa Cruz
location.cities_list: Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Montero, Camiri, San Ignacio de Velasco, Warnes
location.cities_list_w_pop: Santa Cruz de la Sierra (1,831,434), Montero (88,616), Camiri (27,961), San Ignacio de Velasco (23,569), Warnes (22,036)
